user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are made from soft, comfortable materials and offer excellent moisture-wicking properties to keep me cool and dry. I value items that have a stylish design, such as those with recognizable logos or a sporty look, and I appreciate eco-friendly options. Additionally, I tend to favor versatile clothing that can be worn in various settings, whether for casual outings or more active environments. I also have a strong preference for brands that consistently deliver high-quality products, as I find that they rarely disappoint in terms of comfort and fit.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable, stylish underwear that offers good support and keeps me cool all day long. within my expected price range: [33.74, 44.99]
What specific features or materials do you prioritize in underwear for ensuring good support and keeping you cool throughout the day?

I generally prioritize underwear made from soft, comfortable materials with excellent moisture-wicking properties to keep me cool and dry. Support is essential, so I look for a design with a supportive pouch and a snug fit that offers both comfort and functionality. A stylish design is also important to me, as I prefer recognizable logos or a sporty look. Eco-friendly options are a bonus.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <At The Buzzer Thermal Underwear Set for Men> / Item ID: B07BR99S7L / Price: $19.54 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Thermal Underwear'] / Description: ['TWO-PIECE THERMALS FOR THE CLASSIC MAN', 'Stay Warm in Style', 'Our line of solid thermal underwear sets are designed for the guy who likes to keep things timeless with a touch of suave. No busy prints here. Just a choice of great-looking solid colors to go with any outfit and appeal to any taste; from the reserved to the outgoing. We’ve complemented the classic hues with a stylish crew neck and a fitted cut to make layering a frump-free affair. So you can go ahead and wear the long johns under your casual getup or business suit without bumps and bulges. .', 'Breathable Comfort', "Whether you’re layering up to brave the chilly weather or catching some Z’s, this thermal underwear pajama ensures every moment is as comfy as can be. No uncomfortable itching. No uneasy sweating. At The Buzzer's thermal underwear is made using waffle knit fabric comprising of 60% cotton and 40% polyester that’s breathable, extra-soft, and comfortably warm. Choose from our wide size range and treat yourself to an ultra-comfy thermal two-piece underwear set that fits perfectly.", 'Here are more reasons to love this thermal underwear:', '- Keeps you warm without being too bulky.', '- Well-made with no loose threads or skipped stitches.', '- Tapered design at the bottom complements footwear.', '- Washes well without running color or shrinking.', '- Comes in a range of great colors to suit any taste or outfit.', 'Click ‘Add to Cart’ now for a timeless waffle thermal set that keeps you cozy without any of the discomfort!'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Boxer Briefs, Cool Dri Moisture-Wicking Underwear, Cotton No-Ride-up for Men, Multi-Packs Available> / Item ID: B0BH113WW9 / Price: $25.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from 100% cotton that's soft and breathable for everyday comfort (heathered styles are a cotton-rich blend). Our moisture-wicking underwear is designed with Cool Comfort® fabric that helps keep you cool no matter what your day brings. Our experts also designed these men's underwear with no-ride-up construction and a Comfort Flex® waistband that stretches and moves with you. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer on laundry day. We also love how these tagless boxer brief underwear sets are available in multiple color and pack options, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Hi Panties Pack, Moisture-Wicking High-Cut Brief Underwear (Colors May Vary)> / Item ID: B0BRT5PMTX / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["For the leaner, longer, sexier look you want, try Hanes® high-cut cotton briefs. You'll love the silhouette, styled with hi-cut legs and full-coverage front and back, plus the comfort of no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. These quality essential panties are made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. This Hanes®-best underwear has a narrow no-pinch logo waistband that's ultra soft for comfort where you need it most. Plus the cotton is preshrunk so the size you buy is the size they stay. These high-cut cotton briefs from Hanes® are available in convenient stock-up 6-packs in assorted colors."]
